option.name: ACTIVE_ACTIONS
option.value: ,Show Private Members,Show Protected Members,Show Constants,Show Fields,Show Includes

task.summary: - performance update all Scripts in framework - framework now uses less memory - add security key to update.php - add error message by update.php - change in loadSessionHandler the secQuery to safetyQuery - remove in captcha class the deprecated methode create_captcha - add in cache class the methode set_cache_active
- add multi_query_safety - fix insertTable, updateTable and deleteTable for sqlite and sqlite 3 - add static methode getAllDefaultClasses in load_functions

- add autoload class $inCache parameter - fix captcha class the create_better_captcha methode - add curl class downloadFile methode - fix database class the insertTable methode - add images class the optimizedImage methode - add images class the removeMetadata methode - add text class the convertToUTF8 methode - add text class the getCharacterEncoding methode - change loadfunctions class with autoload get inCache methode - minor changes
- add security headers - add redirect by ssl

- cache control filesize by write - curl get_city_coordinates add google api key - template add methode setSingleData - text add methode strip_tags_with_content - url add methode loc_url_simple - minor changes - many bugfixes
- load_functions remove phpMailer - add phpMailer helperclass - update phpMailer thirdParty Framework - add valueObjects for phpMailer - add phpMailer constants - change include_path function
- performance optimizations - add restClient class - change chmod 0777 to chmod 0755 - many bugfixes
- add security functions: create_csrf_token() exists_csrf_token() get_csrf_toke() remove_csrf_token()
- logger remove error - performance update by template.class.php load file - performance update text.class.php - remove Content-Security-Policy - bugfix update.php by security class
- logger remove error - performance update by template.class.php load file - performance update text.class.php - remove Content-Security-Policy - bugfix update.php by security class
- add auto security by _GET and _POST requests
- remove getTemplateFile.php - add HTTP_SKIN constant - add rewrite skin path - change default statistic
- change time measurment by welcome skin

- add new version number system - change database.class.php __construct - add method create_own_error in errors.class.php - fix method copyDirectory in FileSystem.class.php by change chmod - add plugin system 2.0 - remove plugin system 1.0 - info all plugins from 1.0 are deprecated - add language LC_*, change in constants.php - fix logger.class.php all method "permission denied" - change method copyDirectory in number.class.php, $start can now be a date - change method get_diff_value in number.class.php, optimized - change method autoSecurity in security.class.php, optimized - change method url in security.class.php, optimized - change method controllSecurity in security.class.php, optimized and faster - add function getApplyPlugin in implement IPlugin.class.php - change testPlugin.master.class.php from plugin system 1.0 to 2.0 - add value object VOApplyPlugin.php - fix controllExistsPath.php "permission denied" by chmod - change $base_url in constants.php, optimized - add plugins can called before or after from methods - add template childs (child skins next to primary skin) - add method getCssUrl in template class (for child skins) - add method getJsUrl in template class (for child skins) - add method get_host_from_url in url class - add method get_modify_url in url class (replace method get_url_simple) - deprecated method get_url_simple in url class - change method getCurrentUrl in url class, optimized
- fix override language package by update - fix "locale -a" by unix systems
- fix override plugin by update - add method callHook by plugin.class.php
